verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> sick <S%G770><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, named El'azar <S%G2976><s%>, of <S%G575><s%> Beit-Anyah <S%G963><s%>, <S%G1537><s%> the town <S%G2968><s%> of Miryam <S%G3137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> Marta <S%G3136><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> (It was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> that Miryam <S%G3137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> anointed <S%G218><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> with ointment <S%G3464><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wiped <S%G1591><s%> <S%G5660><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> with her <S%G846><s%> hair <S%G2359><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> El'azar <S%G2976><s%> was sick <S%G770><s%> <S%G5707><s%>.)

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> his sisters <S%G79><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, behold <S%G2396><s%>, he whom <S%G3739><s%> thou lovest <S%G5368><s%> <S%G5719><s%> is sick <S%G770><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

When <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> that, he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> sickness <S%G769><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> might be glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5686><s%> thereby <S%G1223><s%> <S%G846><s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5707><s%> Marta <S%G3136><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sister <S%G79><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> El'azar <S%G2976><s%>.

When <S%G5613><s%> he had heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was sick <S%G770><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, he abode <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5656><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> still <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3303><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3739><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%>.

Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> saith he <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to his Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, Let us go <S%G71><s%> <S%G5725><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>.

His Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Master <S%G4461><s%>, the Jews <S%G2453><s%> of late <S%G3568><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5707><s%> to stone <S%G3034><s%> <S%G5658><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> goest thou <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>?

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, Are there <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%>? These things <S%G5023><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> he <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Our <S%G2257><s%> friend <S%G5384><s%> El'azar <S%G2976><s%> sleepeth <S%G2837><s%> <S%G5769><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may awake <S%G1852><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of sleep <S%G1852><s%> <S%G5661><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> he sleep <S%G2837><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, he shall do well <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5701><s%>.

Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> spake <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5715><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> thought <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5656><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had spoken <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> taking of rest <S%G2838><s%> in sleep <S%G5258><s%>.
Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> plainly <S%G3954><s%>, El'azar <S%G2976><s%> is dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5627><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I am glad <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5719><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> your sakes <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G5625><s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>, to the intent <S%G2443><s%> ye may believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5661><s%>; nevertheless <S%G235><s%> let us go <S%G71><s%> <S%G5725><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Didymus <S%G1324><s%>, unto his fellowTalmidim <S%G4827><s%>, Let us <S%G71><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G71><s%> <S%G5725><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> may die <S%G599><s%> <S%G5632><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> when Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, he found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> lain in <S%G1722><s%> the grave <S%G3419><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> already <S%G2235><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Beit-Anyah <S%G963><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> nigh <S%G1451><s%> unto Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>, about <S%G5613><s%> fifteen <S%G1178><s%> furlongs <S%G4712><s%> off <S%G575><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5715><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Marta <S%G3136><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> <S%G4012><s%>, to <S%G2443><s%> comfort <S%G3888><s%> <S%G5667><s%> them <S%G846><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> their <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> Marta <S%G3136><s%>, as soon as <S%G5613><s%> she heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> was coming <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, went and met <S%G5221><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> sat <S%G2516><s%> <S%G5711><s%> still in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, that even <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%>, whatsoever <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> thou wilt ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5672><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> it thee <S%G4671><s%>.
Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, Thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> shall rise again <S%G450><s%> <S%G5698><s%>.

Marta <S%G3136><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%> <S%G5698><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the life <S%G2222><s%>: he that believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>, though <S%G2579><s%> he were dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5632><s%>, yet shall he live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5695><s%>:

She saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>: I <S%G1473><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when she had <S%G2036><s%> so <S%G5023><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, she went her way <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> secretly <S%G2977><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, The Master <S%G1320><s%> is come <S%G3918><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> calleth for <S%G5455><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>.

As soon as <S%G5613><s%> she <S%G1565><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> that, she arose <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5743><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G2064><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5715><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the town <S%G2968><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Marta <S%G3136><s%> met <S%G5221><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%>, and saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, she fell down <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> thou hadst been <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> here <S%G5602><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> had <S%G302><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> died <S%G599><s%> <S%G5627><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he loved <S%G5368><s%> <S%G5707><s%> him <S%G846><s%>!

And <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5711><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the blind <S%G5185><s%>, have caused <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5658><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> should <S%G599><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> have died <S%G599><s%> <S%G5632><s%>?

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> groaning <S%G1690><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the grave <S%G3419><s%>. <S%G1161><s%> It was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a cave <S%G4693><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%> lay <S%G1945><s%> <S%G5711><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, Take ye away <S%G142><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%>. Marta <S%G3136><s%>, the sister <S%G79><s%> of him that was dead <S%G2348><s%> <S%G5761><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, by this time <S%G2235><s%> he stinketh <S%G3605><s%> <S%G5719><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he hath been <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> dead four days <S%G5066><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, Said I <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> thou wouldest believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5661><s%>, thou shouldest see <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5695><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>?

Then <S%G3767><s%> they took away <S%G142><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> from the place where <S%G3757><s%> the dead <S%G2348><s%> <S%G5761><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> laid <S%G2749><s%> <S%G5740><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> lifted <S%G142><s%> <S%G5656><s%> up <S%G507><s%> his eyes <S%G3788><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, I thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou hast heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>.
